issues.clause: The Tenant shall pay rent in the amount of SGD 500.00 per month, but the Landlord reserves the right to increase rent by any amount at any time without prior notice.
issues.rationale: Landlord reserves the right to increase rent by any amount at any time without prior notice is unfair.
issues.recommendation: Negotiate for a reasonable rent increase clause with prior notice.

issues.clause: A security deposit of SGD 2000.00 shall be paid, which will not be refunded under any circumstances, including but not limited to the Tenant never actually moving in.
issues.rationale: A security deposit of SGD 2000.00 shall be paid, which will not be refunded under any circumstances is unfair and exceeds the industry norm of 2 months' rent.
issues.recommendation: Negotiate to reduce deposit to 2 months maximum and ensure refund conditions are fair.

issues.clause: Tenant agrees to allow the Landlord unrestricted access to the premises at all hours, including weekends, public holidays, and during the Tenant's sleep.
issues.rationale: Tenant agrees to allow the Landlord unrestricted access to the premises at all hours is a violation of privacy.
issues.recommendation: Ensure entry notice clause is present and reasonable (e.g., 24 hours notice).

issues.clause: Utilities shall be borne entirely by the Tenant, including electricity, water, gas, air, an theoretical concepts such as 'hope' and 'dreams'.
issues.rationale: Utilities shall be borne entirely by the Tenant, including electricity, water, gas, air, an theoretical concepts such as 'hope' and 'dreams' is unreasonable.
issues.recommendation: Confirm utilities terms are clear and reasonable.

issues.clause: The Tenant is responsible for all repairs, including structural damage, natural disasters, and any cosmic phenomena affecting the unit.
issues.rationale: The Tenant is responsible for all repairs, including structural damage, natural disasters, and any cosmic phenomena affecting the unit is unfair.
issues.recommendation: Negotiate a reasonable cap for minor repairs and exclude structural damage and natural disasters.

issues.clause: Subletting is prohibited unless the Landlord personally profits from it. Any sublet profits not reported to the Landlord will be punishable by immediate eviction and forfeiture of all belongings.
issues.rationale: Subletting is prohibited unless the Landlord personally profits from it is unfair.
issues.recommendation: Confirm subletting terms are clear and fair.

issues.clause: Pets are not allowed, except for those owned by the Landlord. Tenant is required to feed, walk, and groom said pets.
issues.rationale: Pets are not allowed, except for those owned by the Landlord. Tenant is required to feed, walk, and groom said pets is unreasonable.

issues.clause: The Tenant waives all legal rights, including the right to complain, negotiate, or seek fairness. All disputes shall be resolved exclusively by the Landlord's personal opinion.
issues.rationale: The Tenant waives all legal rights, including the right to complain, negotiate, or seek fairness is illegal and unenforceable.

issues.clause: The Agreement shall last for 99 years or until the Tenant's spirit is broken, whichever comes first.
issues.rationale: The Agreement shall last for 99 years or until the Tenant's spirit is broken is unreasonable and exploitative.
issues.recommendation: Negotiate for a standard tenancy period (e.g., 1-2 years).

issues.clause: Governing Law: This Agreement shall be governed by the Laws of Singapore, as well as the arbitrary mood swings of the Landlord.
issues.rationale: Governing Law: This Agreement shall be governed by the Laws of Singapore, as well as the arbitrary mood swings of the Landlord is illegal.
issues.recommendation: Remove the part about the arbitrary mood swings of the Landlord.

issues.clause: Late payment of rent shall incur a penalty equal to the GDP of a small nation, payable immediately.
issues.rationale: Late payment of rent shall incur a penalty equal to the GDP of a small nation is unreasonable.
issues.recommendation: Negotiate for a reasonable late payment penalty.

issues.clause: Tenant must perform weekly entertainment (karaoke, interpretive dance, or comedy routines) for the Landlord without compensation.
issues.rationale: Tenant must perform weekly entertainment for the Landlord without compensation is unreasonable.

issues.clause: Any noise complaints made by the Tenant will be considered a violation of this Agreement and grounds for eviction.
issues.rationale: Any noise complaints made by the Tenant will be considered a violation of this Agreement is unreasonable.

issues.clause: The Landlord reserves the right to use Tenant's room for storage of personal items, livestock, or experimental technology.
issues.rationale: The Landlord reserves the right to use Tenant's room for storage of personal items, livestock, or experimental technology is a violation of privacy.

issues.clause: Tenant shall provide free labor for all landlord's projects, including but not limited to gardening, laundry, and emotional support.
issues.rationale: Tenant shall provide free labor for all landlord's projects is unreasonable.

issues.clause: The Tenant must ask permission before breathing loudly within the unit.
issues.rationale: The Tenant must ask permission before breathing loudly within the unit is unreasonable.

issues.clause: Any guest visiting the Tenant must pay an entrance fee to the Landlord, amount to be determined daily.
issues.rationale: Any guest visiting the Tenant must pay an entrance fee to the Landlord is unreasonable.

issues.clause: Tenant must maintain the apartment temperature strictly within Landlord's comfort range, regardless of Tenant's survival needs.
issues.rationale: Tenant must maintain the apartment temperature strictly within Landlord's comfort range, regardless of Tenant's survival needs is unreasonable.

issues.clause: If the Tenant leaves behind any belongings, they automatically become property of the Landlord, including sentimental items.
issues.rationale: If the Tenant leaves behind any belongings, they automatically become property of the Landlord is unreasonable.
issues.recommendation: Negotiate for a reasonable process for handling abandoned belongings.

issues.clause: Tenant must display unwavering gratitude towards the Landlord at all times. Failure to smile in Landlord's presence constitutes breach.
issues.rationale: Tenant must display unwavering gratitude towards the Landlord at all times is unreasonable.

issues.clause: Renovations or improvements carried out by Tenant become permanent gifts to the Landlord, who takes full credit for them.
issues.rationale: Renovations or improvements carried out by Tenant become permanent gifts to the Landlord is unfair.
issues.recommendation: Negotiate that any improvements made by tenant are recognized.

issues.clause: The Tenant may not question the fairness of any clause in this Agreement, verbally or in writing.
issues.rationale: The Tenant may not question the fairness of any clause in this Agreement is illegal.

issues.clause: Tenant shall not look directly at the Landlord's personal possessions without prior written consent.
issues.rationale: Tenant shall not look directly at the Landlord's personal possessions without prior written consent is unreasonable.

issues.clause: The Tenant agrees to pay additional 'Goodwill Rent' whenever the Landlord feels underappreciated.
issues.rationale: The Tenant agrees to pay additional 'Goodwill Rent' whenever the Landlord feels underappreciated is unreasonable.

issues.clause: The Landlord is entitled to 50% of all Tenant's lottery winnings, inheritances, or found coins on the street.
issues.rationale: The Landlord is entitled to 50% of all Tenant's lottery winnings, inheritances, or found coins on the street is unreasonable.

issues.clause: Tenant must surrender all control of kitchen appliances, including but not limited to the microwave and fridge.
issues.rationale: Tenant must surrender all control of kitchen appliances is unreasonable.

issues.clause: Any attempt by the Tenant to move out requires a six-year written notice.
issues.rationale: Any attempt by the Tenant to move out requires a six-year written notice is unreasonable.
issues.recommendation: Negotiate for a reasonable notice period (e.g., 1-2 months).

issues.clause: The Tenant must water the Landlord's plants and apologize if they wilt, regardless of fault.
issues.rationale: The Tenant must water the Landlord's plants and apologize if they wilt, regardless of fault is unreasonable.

issues.clause: Tenant is responsible for all noise created by neighbors, nearby construction, or passing airplanes.
issues.rationale: Tenant is responsible for all noise created by neighbors, nearby construction, or passing airplanes is unreasonable.

issues.clause: Final Clause: The Landlord reserves the right to add, remove, or modify any clause in this Agreement at any time without Tenant's knowledge or consent.
issues.rationale: The Landlord reserves the right to add, remove, or modify any clause in this Agreement at any time without Tenant's knowledge or consent is illegal.
